item.description:
Hi folks! Let's put on our warmest clothes and get outside for some exercise in the company of friends.

LOCATION: This Meetup will take place at Sleeping Giant, which is a Connecticut State Park located in Hamden.

WHEN AND WHERE: Meet at the big trail map at the Park entrance, which is located on Mt. Carmel Avenue, between 9:55 and 10, and we'll try to get rolling onto the trail by five after 10. We will hike for about 2 hours.

WEAR: Hiking or other sturdy shoes with treads; warm clothing; hat and gloves.

COST: Suggested donation of one dollar, towards the monthly fee that is charged by the Meetup Website. Please bring any contributions with you on the day of the hike.

DIRECTIONS: Please see Sleeping Giant State Park Website.

PARKING NOTE: It is usually free to park inside the gate during the winter months. Please note that at other times the DEP charges a fee to park in the lot. In such cases, please take advantage of the street parking on Mt. Carmel Avenue, adjacent to park, ACROSS FROM (not inside) Quinnipiac University.

Trail maps are usually available at the park entrance, if you are interested.

group.name: New Haven Walks in the Woods

item.name: New Haven Hikers' Sleeping Giant Walk
